name: Blind Faith (lekiam25)
description:
Blind Faith was made for a school project called Project Innovation, we chose to create an audio-only game. Blind Faith was made by a team of 6 people:

Engineers: Maikel Lucas and Leo Jansen

Designers: Joris Kok and Thomas Legebeke

Artists: Faried Elawady and Shera van Hoven

P.S. the game is unfinished and currently has no ending. Our project is over so most likely we won't work on this anymore.
